text:
But Hampton Roads has recently seen an uptick in #COVID19 cases. The percent positivity is 10.1 percent, and it’s been rising for a number of days.

This increase appears to be driven by people who are not adhering to public health guidelines––and I'm very concerned about that. https://t.co/692ZWYR92Q
